The publisher of Australia’s white and yellow pages, Sensis, has just received greenhouse friendly certification from the Federal Government and plans to reduce its carbon footprint by 5%.

Sensis goes carbon neutral, but phone books here to stay

To get greenhouse friendly certification from the government just print millions of 3000 page phone books and litter them across the country. Sensis are literally manufacturing rubbish. The Australian government’s stance on the environment is a joke.
